attributes.action: Abolish the class system and share the wealth amongst everyone to create a Utopia Workers Paradise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ommunism was great as it allowed the "everyone is equal but some are more equal than others" to flourish.this is carried on in spirit by the Civil Service so why not just extend it to the rest of the country and stop pretending we all have an equal say.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
